content-1: 15.   Is your building a healthcare facility where patients stay overnight or does your building house or treat people who have chronic and acute medical problems or weakened immune systems?
content-2: 16.  Does your building primarily house people older than 65 years (like a retirement home or assisted-living facility)?
content-3: 17.  Does your building have multiple housing units and a centralized hot water system (like a hotel or high-rise apartment complex)?
content-4: 18.  Does your building have more than 10 stories (including basement levels)?
